1. Nothing Phone (3) spec-leak reveals 16 GB RAM and 512 GB storage, hinting at AI-powerhouse  Yanko Design
  2. Nothing’s new Phone 3 will be available for general sale in the US  TechCrunch
  3. The Nothing Phone 3 will be available in the US via Amazon  Engadget
  4. Nothing Phone (3) listed by Walmart ahead of launch - GSMArena.com news  GSMArena.com
  5. June 2025 Smartphone Launches: Nothing Phone 3, Oppo K13x And More To Watch Out For  NDTV Profit

item.title: Google Is Now Rolling Out AI Mode In The US - Search Engine Roundtable
item.description:
1. Google Is Now Rolling Out AI Mode In The US  Search Engine Roundtable
  2. Google AI Mode finally rolling out to all users in the U.S.  Search Engine Land
  3. Mozilla frets about Google's push to build AI into Chrome  theregister.com
  4. Google has added ‘AI Mode’ to their Traditional Google Search service for U.S. users in a move to extend its Search Dominance  patentlyapple.com
  5. Excel skills no longer needed? Google secretly testing ‘Visual Search’ with ‘Live Charts’  Hindustan Times
